title: And why you shouldn’t vote
author: VD
content_html:
Laura Mckenna explains the appeal of the Lizard Queen:

Taking a grudge to an empty voting booth may be passive aggressive, but that’s sometimes how we work.

Notice how part of the bitterness stems from realizing that there’s a gap between academic achievement and actual achievement.

“We’re sailing through school work, out pacing men in the classroom. It’s only when the hard realities of family and work hit that women understand that they get the short end of the stick.”

And then notice that in this woman’s fevered imagination, reality = “soft sexism”.
